TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebClient extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 提供從 URI 所識別的資源中，傳送與接收資料的常見方法。

span.span: Provides common methods for sending data to and receiving data from a resource identified by a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供常見的方法，將資料傳送到或收到來自任何本機、 內部網路或網際網路資源 URI 所識別的資料。The class provides common methods for sending data to or receiving data from any local, intranet, or Internet resource identified by a URI. 類別會使用類別，以提供資源的存取權。The class uses the class to provide access to resources. 執行個體可以存取與任何資料子代向方法。 instances can access data with any descendant registered with the method. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，.NET Framework 支援之 Uri 的開頭`http:`， `https:`，ftp:、 和`file:`配置識別項。By default, the .NET Framework supports URIs that begin with `http:`, `https:`, ftp:, and `file:` scheme identifiers. 下表描述以上傳資料至資源的方法。The following table describes methods for uploading data to a resource. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||擷取用來將資料傳送至資源。Retrieves a used to send data to the resource.| ||擷取用來將資料傳送至資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Retrieves a used to send data to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||傳送的位元組陣列的資源，並傳回陣列，包含任何回應。Sends a byte array to the resource and returns a array containing any response.| ||傳送陣列資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Sends a array to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||傳送至資源的本機檔案，並傳回陣列，包含任何回應。Sends a local file to the resource and returns a array containing any response.| ||本機將檔案傳送至資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Sends a local file to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||傳送資源並傳回陣列，包含任何回應。Sends a to the resource and returns a array containing any response.| ||傳送資源並傳回陣列，包含任何回應，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Sends a to the resource and returns a array containing any response, without blocking the calling thread.| ||傳送至資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Sends a to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||傳送至資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Sends a to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| 下表描述從資源下載資料的方法。The following table describes methods for downloading data from a resource. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||傳回的資料從做為資源。Returns the data from a resource as a .| ||在資源上，從傳回的資料，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Returns the data from a resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||從資源下載資料，並傳回陣列。Downloads data from a resource and returns a array.| ||從資源下載資料，並傳回陣列，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Downloads data from a resource and returns a array, without blocking the calling thread.| ||從資源將資料下載到本機檔案。Downloads data from a resource to a local file.| ||資料從資源下載到本機檔案，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Downloads data from a resource to a local file, without blocking the calling thread.| ||下載從資源，並傳回。Downloads a from a resource and returns a .| ||下載從資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Downloads a from a resource, without blocking the calling thread.| 您可以使用方法來取消尚未完成的非同步作業。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. A執行個體不會傳送預設的選擇性的 HTTP 標頭。A instance does not send optional HTTP headers by default. 如果您的要求需要選用的標頭，您必須加入至標頭集合。If your request requires an optional header, you must add the header to the collection. 例如，若要保留在回應中的查詢，您必須加入使用者代理程式標頭。For example, to retain queries in the response, you must add a user-agent header. 此外，伺服器可能會傳回 500 （內部伺服器錯誤），如果使用者代理程式標頭遺失。Also, servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the user agent header is missing. 設定為`true`中執行個體。 is set to `true` in instances. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會接受資源 URI、 擷取其值，然後顯示回應。The following code example takes the URI of a resource, retrieves it, and displays the response. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientUserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientUserAgent/CPP/useragent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientUserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientUserAgent/CS/useragent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientUserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientUserAgent/VB/useragent.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式建立的新執行個體類別。The default constructor creates a new instance of the class. 預設的 HTTP 方法為 GET。The default HTTP method is GET. 預設 FTP 方法是重試。The default FTP method is RETR. 預設的 是 。The default is . 的預設值為 `true`。The default value of is `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立執行個體，然後再使用它可從伺服器下載的資料，並顯示在系統主控台，以從伺服器下載的資料，並將它寫入至檔案，和上傳至伺服器的表單值和接收回應。The following code example creates a instance and then uses it to download data from a server and display it on the system console, to download data from a server and write it to a file, and to upload form values to a server and receive the response. [!code-cpp[WebClient#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient/CPP/webclient.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient/CS/webclient.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient/VB/webclient.vb#1)]

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`true`，所以無法讀取應用程式在記憶體中緩衝資料。When the property is `true`, the data is buffered in memory so it is ready to be read by the app.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`true`，讓它與網際網路資源，在較大的區塊可以更有效率地撰寫在記憶體中緩衝的資料。When the property is `true`, the data is buffered in memory so it can be written more efficiently to the Internet resource in larger chunks.

summary.span: 取得或設定由 要求的基底 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the base URI for requests made by a .

value.span: ，包含 所提出之要求的基底 URI；如果未指定基底位址 (Base Address)，則為 。

span.span: A containing the base URI for requests made by a or if no base address has been specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含與相對位址結合的基底 URI。The property contains a base URI that is combined with a relative address. 當您呼叫的方法，上傳或下載資料、物件結合此基底 URI 與您在方法呼叫中指定的相對位址。When you call a method that uploads or downloads data, the object combines this base URI with the relative address you specify in the method call. 如果您指定絕對 URI，不會使用屬性值。If you specify an absolute URI, does not use the property value. 若要移除先前設定的值，這個屬性設定為`null`或空字串 ("")。To remove a previously set value, set this property to `null` or an empty string (""). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從網際網路伺服器下載資料，並顯示在主控台上。The following code example downloads data from an Internet server and displays it on the console. 它假設伺服器的位址 (例如http://www.contoso.com)處於`hostUri`和中的資源 （例如 /default.htm) 的路徑`uriSuffix`。It assumes that the server's address (such as http://www.contoso.com) is in `hostUri` and that the path to the resource (such as /default.htm) is in `uriSuffix`. [!code-cpp[WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders/CPP/webclient_baseaddress_responseheaders.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders/CS/webclient_baseaddress_responseheaders.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders/VB/webclient_baseaddress_responseheaders.vb#1)]

span.span: is set to an invalid URI.

exception.span: 內部例外狀況可能包含可以協助您尋找錯誤的資訊。

span.span: The inner exception may contain information that will help you locate the error.

public: void CancelAsync();

summary.span: 取消暫止的非同步作業。

span.span: Cancels a pending asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果作業暫止，這個方法會呼叫基礎。If an operation is pending, this method calls on the underlying . 當您呼叫，您的應用程式還是會收到與作業相關聯的完成事件。When you call , your application still receives the completion event associated with the operation. 例如，當您呼叫取消作業，如果您已經指定的事件處理常式事件，事件處理常式會接收通知，此作業已結束。For example, when you call to cancel a operation, if you have specified an event handler for the event, your event handler receives notification that the operation has ended. 若要深入了解作業是否成功完成，請檢查屬性的基底類別上在事件資料物件傳遞至事件處理常式。To learn whether the operation completed successfully, check the property on the base class of in the event data object passed to the event handler. 如果沒有任何非同步作業正在進行中，這個方法任何作用。If no asynchronous operation is in progress, this method does nothing.

summary.span: 取得或設定傳送至主機並用於驗證要求的網路認證。

span.span: Gets or sets the network credentials that are sent to the host and used to authenticate the request.

value.span: ，包含要求的驗證認證。

span.span: An containing the authentication credentials for the request.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含用來存取在主機上的資源的驗證認證。The property contains the authentication credentials used to access a resource on a host. 在大部分的用戶端情況下，您應該使用，這是目前登入使用者的認證。In most client-side scenarios, you should use the , which are the credentials of the currently logged on user. 若要這樣做，請設定屬性`true`而不是設定這個屬性。To do this, set the property to `true` instead of setting this property. 如果中介層應用程式，例如 ASP.NET 應用程式中使用類別隸屬於執行 ASP 網頁 （伺服器端的認證） 的帳戶。If the class is being used in a middle tier application, such as an ASP.NET application, the belong to the account running the ASP page (the server-side credentials). 一般而言，您會設定此屬性代表其提出要求的用戶端的認證。Typically, you would set this property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made. 基於安全性理由，會自動遵循重新導向時，會儲存您想要包含在中的重新導向的認證並將它指派給這個屬性。For security reasons, when automatically following redirects, store the credentials that you want to be included in the redirect in a and assign it to this property. 這個屬性會自動設定為`null`時重新導向，如果它包含以外的項目。This property will automatically be set to `null` upon redirection if it contains anything except a . 具有此屬性的值會自動設為`null`在這些情況下不會將認證傳送到任何非預期的目的地。Having this property value be automatically set to `null` under those conditions prevents credentials from being sent to any unintended destination. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用使用者的系統認證來驗證要求。The following code example uses the user's system credentials to authenticate a request. [!code-cpp[WebClientAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClientAuthentication/CPP/webclientauth.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClientAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClientAuthentication/CS/webclientauth.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClientAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClientAuthentication/VB/webclientauth.vb#1)]

summary.span: 從指定的 URI 下載資源做為 陣列。

span.span: Downloads the resource as a array from the URI specified.

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] DownloadData (string address);
.method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] DownloadData(string address) cil managed
Public Function DownloadData (address As String) As Byte()
public: cli::array <System::Byte> ^ DownloadData(System::String ^ address);

param.name: address
param.span: 要從中下載資料的 URI。

span.span: The URI from which to download data.

summary.span: 從指定的 URI 下載資源做為 陣列。

span.span: Downloads the resource as a array from the URI specified.

returns.span: 陣列，包含下載的資源。

span.span: A array containing the downloaded resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法所指定的 URI 與下載資源`address`參數。The method downloads the resource with the URI specified by the `address` parameter. 這個方法會封鎖下載資源時。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下載的資源，並繼續等待伺服器回應時執行，請使用其中一種方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用 FTP 資源下載 RETR 命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從伺服器要求資料，並顯示傳回的資料。The following code example requests data from a server and displays the data returned. 它假設`remoteUri`包含要求的資料是有效的 URI。It assumes that `remoteUri` contains a valid URI for the requested data. [!code-cpp[WebClient_DownloadData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadData/CPP/webclient_downloaddata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_DownloadData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadData/CS/webclient_downloaddata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_DownloadData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadData/VB/webclient_downloaddata.vb#1)]

HTTP 資源，會使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. **請注意**應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。**Note** This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取指定的資源中指定的 URI 配置相關聯的通訊協定使用的預設方法`address`。This method retrieves the specified resource using the default method for the protocol associated with the URI scheme specified in `address`. 以非同步方式使用從執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源下載資料。The data is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒時下載資源。This method does not block the calling thread while downloading the resource. 若要下載的資源和封鎖，等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種方法。To download a resource and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 當下載完成時，就會引發事件。When the download completes, the event is raised. 您的應用程式必須處理這個事件來接收通知。Your application must handle this event to receive notification. 下載的資料是用於屬性。The downloaded data is available in the property. 您可以使用方法來取消尚未完成的非同步作業。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 這個方法會使用 FTP 資源下載 RETR 命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取指定的資源中指定的 URI 配置相關聯的通訊協定使用的預設方法`address`。This method retrieves the specified resource using the default method for the protocol associated with the URI scheme specified in `address`. 以非同步方式使用從執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源下載資料。The data is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒時下載資源。This method does not block the calling thread while downloading the resource. 若要下載的資源和封鎖，等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種方法。To download a resource and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 當下載完成時，就會引發事件。When the download completes, the event is raised. 您的應用程式必須處理這個事件來接收通知。Your application must handle this event to receive notification. 下載的資料是用於屬性。The downloaded data is available in the property. 您可以使用方法來取消尚未完成的非同步作業。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 這個方法會使用 FTP 資源下載 RETR 命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous data download operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次非同步資料下載作業完成時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous data download operation completes. 藉由呼叫啟動非同步資料下載方法。Asynchronous data downloads are started by calling the methods. 是針對此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別提供的事件資料的事件處理常式。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個事件的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回資料資源下載完成後，物件會完成。The returned object will complete after the data resource has been downloaded. 這個方法會擷取指定的資源中指定的 URI 配置相關聯的通訊協定使用的預設方法`address`參數。This method retrieves the specified resource using the default method for the protocol associated with the URI scheme specified in the `address` parameter. 以非同步方式使用從執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源下載資料。The data is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用 FTP 資源下載 RETR 命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 下列程式碼範例會從伺服器要求資料，並顯示傳回的資料。The following code example requests data from a server and displays the data returned. 它假設`remoteUri`包含要求的資料是有效的 URI。It assumes that `remoteUri` contains a valid URI for the requested data.

span.span: Downloads the resource with the specified URI to a local file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會下載到本機檔案資料中所指定的 URI 從`address`參數。The method downloads to a local file data from the URI specified by in the `address` parameter. 這個方法會封鎖下載資源時。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下載的資源，並繼續等待伺服器回應時執行，請使用其中一種方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用 FTP 資源下載 RETR 命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 在中介層應用程式，例如 ASP.NET 頁面上，使用這個方法時您會收到錯誤，如果應用程式執行所在的帳戶沒有存取檔案的權限。When using this method in a middle tier application, such as an ASP.NET page, you will receive an error if the account under which the application executes does not have permission to access the file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會下載檔案，以從http://www.contoso.com至本機硬碟。The following code example downloads a file from http://www.contoso.com to the local hard drive. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會下載的資源中所指定的 URI`address`參數。This method downloads the resource at the URI specified by in the `address` parameter. 下載的檔案下載成功完成時，名為`fileName`本機電腦上。When the download completes successfully, the downloaded file is named `fileName` on the local computer. 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式下載檔案。The file is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要接收通知，檔案時，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the file is available, add an event handler to the event. 這個方法不會在下載的資源時封鎖呼叫執行緒。This method does not block the calling thread while the resource is being downloaded. 若要封鎖等候下載完成時，使用其中一種方法。To block while waiting for the download to complete, use one of the methods. 您可以使用方法來取消尚未完成的非同步作業。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未指定絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用 FTP 資源下載 RETR 命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 當 ASP.NET 網頁中使用此方法，您會收到錯誤，如果執行該網頁的帳戶沒有存取本機檔案的權限。When using this method in an ASP.NET page, you will receive an error if the account that the page executes under does not have permission to access the local file.

summary.span: 在非同步下載作業成功傳輸部分或全部資料時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous download operation successfully transfers some or all of the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次非同步下載有進展時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous download makes progress. 使用下列方法之一啟動下載時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised when downloads are started using any of the following methods. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||從資源下載資料，並傳回陣列，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Downloads data from a resource and returns a array, without blocking the calling thread.| ||資料從資源下載到本機檔案，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Downloads data from a resource to a local file, without blocking the calling thread.| ||在資源上，從傳回的資料，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Returns the data from a resource, without blocking the calling thread.| 是針對此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別提供的事件資料的事件處理常式。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 被動 FTP 檔案傳輸永遠會顯示進度百分比為零，因為伺服器未傳送的檔案大小。A passive FTP file transfer will always show a progress percentage of zero, since the server did not send the file size. 若要顯示進度，您可以變更 FTP 連線為作用中覆寫虛擬方法：To show progress, you can change the FTP connection to active by overriding the virtual method: ``` internal class MyWebClient:WebClient{ protected override WebRequest GetWebRequest(Uri address) { FtpWebRequest req = (FtpWebRequest)base.GetWebRequest(address); req.UsePassive = false; return req; } } ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個事件的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#19)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#19)] 下列程式碼範例顯示這個事件處理常式的實作。The following code example shows an implementation of a handler for this event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取指定的資源。This method retrieves the specified resource. 它的資源下載之後，會使用此方法中指定的編碼要轉換之資源屬性。After it downloads the resource, the method uses the encoding specified in the property to convert the resource to a . 這個方法會封鎖下載資源時。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下載的資源，並繼續等待伺服器回應時執行，請使用其中一種方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用 FTP 資源下載 RETR 命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取指定的資源。This method retrieves the specified resource. 它的資源下載之後，會使用此方法中指定的編碼要轉換之資源屬性。After it downloads the resource, the method uses the encoding specified in the property to convert the resource to a . 這個方法會封鎖下載資源時。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下載的資源，並繼續等待伺服器回應時執行，請使用其中一種方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用 FTP 資源下載 RETR 命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含包含通訊協定標頭的執行個體，與要求一起傳送。The property contains a instance containing protocol headers that the sends with the request. 某些常見的標頭會被視為限制和保護的系統和無法設定或變更在物件。Some common headers are considered restricted and are protected by the system and cannot be set or changed in a object. 任何嘗試這些限制的標頭中的其中一個設定物件相關聯物件將會擲回例外狀況之後，當嘗試傳送要求。Any attempt to set one of these restricted headers in the object associated with a object will throw an exception later when attempting to send the request. 系統所保護的受限制標頭包含，但不是限於下列：Restricted headers protected by the system include, but are not limited to the following: - 日期Date - 主機Host 此外，某些其他標頭也會限制使用時物件。In addition, some other headers are also restricted when using a object. 這些限制的標頭包含，但不是限於下列：These restricted headers include, but are not limited to the following: - 接受Accept - 連線Connection - Content-LengthContent-Length - 預期 (當此值設定為"100-繼續 」Expect (when the value is set to "100-continue" - If-Modified-SinceIf-Modified-Since - 範圍Range - Transfer-EncodingTransfer-Encoding 類別具有上述的標頭部分，將設定的屬性。The class has properties for setting some of the above headers. 如果是很重要的應用程式設定這些標頭，然後在應該使用類別，而不是類別。If it is important for an application to set these headers, then the class should be used instead of the class. 您不應該假設的標頭值會維持不變，因為 Web 伺服器和快取可能會變更或加入至 Web 要求的標頭。You should not assume that the header values will remain unchanged, because Web servers and caches may change or add headers to a Web request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用集合來設定 HTTP`Content-Type`標頭`application/x-www-form-urlencoded,`通知表單資料的伺服器連接到，使用 post 要求。The following code example uses the collection to set the HTTP `Content-Type` header to `application/x-www-form-urlencoded,` to notify the server that form data is attached to the post. [!code-cpp[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/CPP/webclient_uploaddata_headers.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/CS/webclient_uploaddata_headers.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/VB/webclient_uploaddata_headers.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承自這個類別的類別可以覆寫此方法，以執行其他工作時就會發生事件。Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md) 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範衍生自的類別可以自訂此方法的實作。The following code example shows an implementation of this method that can be customized by a class derived from . remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承自這個類別的類別可以覆寫此方法，以執行其他工作時就會發生事件。Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範衍生自的類別可以自訂此方法的實作。The following code example shows an implementation of this method that can be customized by a class derived from . [!code-cpp[NCLCustomWebClient#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCustomWebClient/CPP/mywebclient.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[NCLCustomWebClient#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCustomWebClient/CS/mywebclient.cs#14)]

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立用來讀取所指定之資源的內容執行個體`address`參數。The method creates a instance used to read the contents of the resource specified by the `address` parameter. 這個方法會封鎖在開啟資料流時。This method blocks while opening the stream. 若要繼續執行等候資料流時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是`null`，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not `null`, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用 FTP 資源下載 RETR 命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 您必須呼叫完成若要避免系統資源不足。You must call when finished with the to avoid running out of system resources. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟所識別的資源`uriString`和系統主控台上顯示結果。The following code example opens the resource identified by `uriString` and displays the results on the system console. 請注意，傳回在讀取資料時，已關閉。Note that the returned by is closed when the data has been read. [!code-cpp[WebClient_OpenRead#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenRead/CPP/webclient_openread.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_OpenRead#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenRead/CS/webclient_openread.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_OpenRead#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenRead/VB/webclient_openread.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取用來存取指定的資源執行個體`address`參數。This method retrieves a instance used to access the resource specified by the `address` parameter. 使用自動配置的執行緒資源，從執行緒集區取得資料流。The stream is obtained using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要接收通知，資料流時，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the stream is available, add an event handler to the event. > [!NOTE] > 您必須呼叫您已完成若要避免系統資源不足。You must call when you are finished with the to avoid running out of system resources. 開啟資料流時，這個方法不會不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is opening. 若要封鎖等候資料流時，請使用方法。To block while waiting for the stream, use the method. 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未指定絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求之資源的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested resource. 如果屬性不是`null`，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not `null`, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用 FTP 資源下載 RETR 命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回用來將資料傳送給資源的可寫入資料流。The method returns a writable stream that is used to send data to a resource. 這個方法會封鎖在開啟資料流時。This method blocks while opening the stream. 若要繼續執行等候資料流時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從命令列讀取資料，並使用若要取得的資料寫入資料的資料流。The following code example reads data from the command line and uses to obtain a stream for writing the data. 請注意，傳回傳送資料之後關閉。Note that the returned by is closed after the data is sent. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取用來將資料傳送給資源的可寫入資料流。This method retrieves a writable stream that is used to send data to a resource. 資料流擷取使用自動配置的執行緒資源從執行緒集區。The stream is retrieved using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要接收通知，資料流時，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the stream is available, add an event handler to the event. 當您關閉資料流時，執行緒會封鎖，直到要求傳送至`address`和收到的回應。When you close the stream, the thread blocks until the request is sent to `address` and a response is received. 這個方法不開啟資料流時封鎖呼叫執行緒。This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is being opened. 若要封鎖等候資料流時，使用其中一種方法。To block while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次開啟用來將資料傳送至資源資料流的非同步作業完成時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous operation to open a stream that is used to send data to a resource completes. 這些作業會藉由呼叫啟動方法。These operations are started by calling the methods. 是針對此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別提供的事件資料的事件處理常式。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個事件的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#14)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#14)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件之後，才會完成已開啟的資料資源的可寫入資料流。The returned object will complete after the a writable stream to the data resource has been opened. 開啟資料流時，這個方法不會不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is opening. 這個方法會擷取用來將資料寫入至指定的資源執行個體`address`參數。This method retrieves a instance used to write data to the resource specified by the `address` parameter. 使用自動配置的執行緒資源，從執行緒集區取得資料流。The stream is obtained using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. > [!NOTE] > 您必須呼叫您已完成若要避免系統資源不足。You must call when you are finished with the to avoid running out of system resources. 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳送給資源的資料緩衝區。The method sends a data buffer to a resource. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. 如果伺服器不了解基礎的要求，基礎的通訊協定類別會判斷發生何種狀況。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 一般而言，會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 方法會將傳送的內容`data`伺服器，而不予以編碼。The method sends the content of `data` to the server without encoding it. 這個方法會封鎖將上傳資料時。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將主控台，以從輸入字串轉換陣列，並將張貼到指定的伺服器時使用陣列。The following code example converts a string entered from the console to a array and posts the array to the specified server using . 任何來自伺服器的回應會顯示到主控台。Any response from the server is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[WebClient_UpLoadData2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData2/CPP/webclient_uploaddata2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_UpLoadData2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData2/CS/webclient_uploaddata2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_UpLoadData2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData2/VB/webclient_uploaddata2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳送給資源的資料緩衝區。The method sends a data buffer to a resource. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. 如果伺服器不了解基礎的要求，基礎的通訊協定類別會判斷發生何種狀況。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 一般而言，會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 方法會將傳送的內容`data`伺服器，而不予以編碼。The method sends the content of `data` to the server without encoding it. 這個方法會封鎖將上傳資料時。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳送資料緩衝區資源，使用中指定的 HTTP 方法至`method`參數，並從伺服器傳回任何回應。The method sends a data buffer to a resource using the HTTP method specified in the `method` parameter, and returns any response from the server. 這個方法會封鎖將上傳資料時。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 方法會將傳送的內容`data`伺服器，而不予以編碼。The method sends the content of `data` to the server without encoding it. 如果`method`參數會指定不了解伺服器基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況的動詞命令。If the `method` parameter specifies a verb that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 一般而言，會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將字串從主控台輸入的位元組陣列轉換，並將張貼到指定的伺服器時使用陣列。The following code example converts a string entered from the console into a byte array and posts the array to the specified server using . 任何來自伺服器的回應會顯示到主控台。Any response from the server is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/CPP/webclient_uploaddata_headers.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/CS/webclient_uploaddata_headers.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/VB/webclient_uploaddata_headers.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳送至資源的資料緩衝區。This method sends a data buffer to a resource. 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送的資料緩衝區。The data buffer is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 未編碼的資料。The data is not encoded. 若要接收通知，資料上傳完成時，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the data upload completes, add an event handler to the event. 這個方法不會在傳送資料時封鎖呼叫執行緒。This method does not block the calling thread while the data is being sent. 若要傳送的資料與區塊等待伺服器回應時，請使用其中方法。To send data and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 在非同步資料上載作業完成時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous data-upload operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次非同步資料上傳作業完成時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous data upload operation completes. 藉由呼叫啟動非同步資料上載方法。Asynchronous data uploads are started by calling the methods. 是針對此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別提供的事件資料的事件處理常式。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個事件的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#36](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#36)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#36](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#36)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#36)]

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<unsigned int8[]> UploadDataTaskAsync(string address, unsigned int8[] data) cil managed
Public Function UploadDataTaskAsync (address As String, data As Byte()) As Task(Of Byte())
public: System::Threading::Tasks::Task<cli::array <System::Byte> ^> ^ UploadDataTaskAsync(System::String ^ address, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ data);

param.name: address
param.span: 要接收資料之資源的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the resource to receive the data.

param.name: data
param.span: 要傳送至資源的資料緩衝區。

span.span: The data buffer to send to the resource.

summary.span: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式，將包含 陣列的資料緩衝區上傳至指定的 URI。

span.span: Uploads a data buffer that contains a array to the URI specified as an asynchronous operation using a task object.

returns.span: 傳回 。

span.span: Returns .

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件上的 屬性會傳回包含上傳資料緩衝區時接收自資源之回應主體的 陣列。

span.span: The property on the task object returns a array containing the body of the response received from the resource when the data buffer was uploaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回之後才會完成的物件資料緩衝區已上傳的資源。The returned object will complete after the a data buffer has been uploaded to the resource. 這個方法會傳送至資源的資料緩衝區。This method sends a data buffer to a resource. 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送的資料緩衝區。The data buffer is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 未編碼的資料。The data is not encoded. 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

span.span: The URI formed by combining and is invalid.
-or-

-or-

span.span: There was no response from the server hosting the resource.

Public Function UploadFile (address As String, fileName As String) As Byte()
public: cli::array <System::Byte> ^ UploadFile(System::String ^ address, System::String ^ fileName);

param.name: address
param.span: 要接收檔案之資源的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the resource to receive the file.

param.span: 例如 ftp://localhost/samplefile.txt.

span.span: For example, ftp://localhost/samplefile.txt.

param.name: fileName
param.span: 要傳送至資源的檔案。

span.span: The file to send to the resource.

summary.span: 將指定的本機檔案上載至具有指定之 URI 的資源。

span.span: Uploads the specified local file to a resource with the specified URI.

returns.span: 陣列，包含來自資源的回應主體。

span.span: A array containing the body of the response from the resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將本機檔案傳送到資源。The method sends a local file to a resource. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. 這個方法會封鎖將上傳檔案時。This method blocks while uploading the file. 若要繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. `POST`方法由 HTTP 所定義。The `POST` method is defined by HTTP. 如果基礎要求不會使用 HTTP 和`POST`不了解伺服器基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況。If the underlying request does not use HTTP and `POST` is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 一般而言，會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將指定的檔案上傳至指定的 URI 使用。The following code example uploads the specified file to the specified URI using . 伺服器傳回的任何回應會顯示在主控台上。Any response returned by the server is displayed on the console. [!code-cpp[WebClient_UpLoadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadFile/CPP/webclient_uploadfile.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_UpLoadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadFile/CS/webclient_uploadfile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_UpLoadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadFile/VB/webclient_uploadfile.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，可以接受張貼的檔案，因此適合用於搭配方法。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that can accept posted files and is suitable for use with the method. 頁面必須位於 Web 伺服器上。The page must reside on a Web server. 其位址提供的值`address`參數方法。Its address provides the value for the `address` parameter of the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[NCLWebClientAsp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsp/CS/fileuploadercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[NCLWebClientAsp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsp/VB/fileuploadervb.aspx#1)]

Public Function UploadFile (address As String, method As String, fileName As String) As Byte()
public: cli::array <System::Byte> ^ UploadFile(System::String ^ address, System::String ^ method, System::String ^ fileName);

param.name: address
param.span: 要接收檔案之資源的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the resource to receive the file.

param.name: method
param.span: 傳送檔案給資源所使用的方法。

span.span: The method used to send the file to the resource.

param.span: 如果是 ，預設的 HTTP 為 POST，而 FTP 則為 STOR。

span.span: If , the default is POST for http and STOR for ftp.

param.name: fileName
param.span: 要傳送至資源的檔案。

span.span: The file to send to the resource.

summary.span: 使用指定的方法，將指定的本機檔案上載至指定的資源。

span.span: Uploads the specified local file to the specified resource, using the specified method.

returns.span: 陣列，包含來自資源的回應主體。

span.span: A array containing the body of the response from the resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當位址會指定 HTTP 資源，方法會將本機檔案傳送至使用中指定的 HTTP 方法的資源`method`參數，並從伺服器傳回任何回應。When address specifies an HTTP resource, the method sends a local file to a resource using the HTTP method specified in the `method` parameter and returns any response from the server. 這個方法會封鎖將上傳檔案時。This method blocks while uploading the file. 若要繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果`method`參數會指定伺服器無法辨識的動詞命令或`address`資源，基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況。If the `method` parameter specifies a verb that is not understood by the server or the `address` resource, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 一般而言，會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將指定的檔案上傳至指定的 URI 使用。The following code example uploads the specified file to the specified URI using . 伺服器傳回的任何回應會顯示在主控台上。Any response returned by the server is displayed on the console. [!code-cpp[WebClient_UpLoadFile2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadFile2/CPP/webclient_uploadfile2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_UpLoadFile2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadFile2/CS/webclient_uploadfile2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_UpLoadFile2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadFile2/VB/webclient_uploadfile2.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，可以接受張貼的檔案，因此適合用於搭配方法。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that can accept posted files and is suitable for use with the method. 頁面必須位於 Web 伺服器上。The page must reside on a Web server. 其位址提供的值`address`參數方法。Its address provides the value for the `address` parameter of the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[NCLWebClientAsp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsp/CS/fileuploadercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[NCLWebClientAsp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsp/VB/fileuploadervb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void UploadFileAsync (Uri address, string fileName);
.method public hidebysig instance void UploadFileAsync(class System.Uri address, string fileName) cil managed
Public Sub UploadFileAsync (address As Uri, fileName As String)
public: void UploadFileAsync(Uri ^ address, System::String ^ fileName);

param.name: address
param.span: 要接收檔案之資源的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the resource to receive the file.

param.span: 對於 HTTP 資源而言，這個 URI 必須識別出可以接受使用 POST 方法傳送之要求的資源，例如指令碼或 ASP 網頁。

span.span: For HTTP resources, this URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the POST method, such as a script or ASP page.

param.name: fileName
param.span: 要傳送至資源的檔案。

span.span: The file to send to the resource.

summary.span: 使用 POST 方法，將指定的本機檔案上載至指定的資源。

span.span: Uploads the specified local file to the specified resource, using the POST method.

summary.span: 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

span.span: This method does not block the calling thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送檔案。The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要接收通知，檔案上傳完成時，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the file upload completes, add an event handler to the event. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，檔案會在傳送時。This method does not block the calling thread while the file is being sent. 若要等待伺服器回應時傳送的檔案和區塊，使用其中一種方法。To send a file and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

.event class System.Net.UploadFileCompletedEventHandler UploadFileCompleted
Public Custom Event UploadFileCompleted As UploadFileCompletedEventHandler
public: event System::Net::UploadFileCompletedEventHandler ^ UploadFileCompleted;

summary.span: 在非同步檔案上載作業完成時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous file-upload operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次非同步檔案上傳作業完成時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous file upload operation completes. 藉由呼叫啟動非同步檔案上載方法。Asynchronous file uploads are started by calling the methods. 是針對此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別提供的事件資料的事件處理常式。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個事件的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#4)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#4)]

summary.span: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式將指定的本機檔案上傳至資源。

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<unsigned int8[]> UploadFileTaskAsync(string address, string fileName) cil managed
Public Function UploadFileTaskAsync (address As String, fileName As String) As Task(Of Byte())
public: System::Threading::Tasks::Task<cli::array <System::Byte> ^> ^ UploadFileTaskAsync(System::String ^ address, System::String ^ fileName);

param.name: address
param.span: 要接收檔案之資源的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the resource to receive the file.

param.span: 對於 HTTP 資源而言，這個 URI 必須識別出可以接受使用 POST 方法傳送之要求的資源，例如指令碼或 ASP 網頁。

span.span: For HTTP resources, this URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the POST method, such as a script or ASP page.

param.name: fileName
param.span: 要傳送至資源的本機檔案。

span.span: The local file to send to the resource.

summary.span: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式將指定的本機檔案上傳至資源。

span.span: Uploads the specified local file to a resource as an asynchronous operation using a task object.

returns.span: 傳回 。

span.span: Returns .

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件上的 屬性會傳回包含上傳檔案時接收自資源之回應主體的 陣列。

span.span: The property on the task object returns a array containing the body of the response received from the resource when the file was uploaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件會在已上傳至資源的檔案之後, 完成。The returned object will complete after the file has been uploaded to the resource. 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送檔案。The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

-or-

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventHandler UploadProgressChanged;
.event class System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventHandler UploadProgressChanged
Public Custom Event UploadProgressChanged As UploadProgressChangedEventHandler
public: event System::Net::UploadProgressChangedEventHandler ^ UploadProgressChanged;

summary.span: 在非同步上傳作業成功傳輸部分或全部資料時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous upload operation successfully transfers some or all of the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次非同步上傳有進展時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous upload makes progress. 使用下列方法之一啟動上傳時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised when uploads are started using any of the following methods. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||傳送陣列資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Sends a array to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||本機將檔案傳送至資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Sends a local file to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||傳送資源並傳回陣列，包含任何回應，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Sends a to the resource and returns a array containing any response, without blocking the calling thread.| 是針對此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別提供的事件資料的事件處理常式。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個事件的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#4)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#4)] 下列程式碼範例顯示這個事件處理常式的實作。The following code example shows an implementation of a handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#42](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#42)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#42](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#42)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#42)]

summary.span: 將指定的字串上傳至指定的資源。

span.span: Uploads the specified string to the specified resource.

param.name: address

param.span: 對於 HTTP 資源而言，這個 URI 必須識別出可以接受使用 POST 方法傳送之要求的資源，例如指令碼或 ASP 網頁。

span.span: For Http resources, this URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the POST method, such as a script or ASP page.

param.span: 要上傳的字串。

span.span: The string to be uploaded.

summary.span: 使用 POST 方法，將指定的字串上載至指定的資源。

span.span: Uploads the specified string to the specified resource, using the POST method.

returns.span: ，其中包含由伺服器傳送的回應。

span.span: A containing the response sent by the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上傳之前的字串，這個方法轉換成陣列使用中指定的編碼屬性。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 這個方法會在傳輸字串時封鎖。This method blocks while the string is transmitted. 若要將字串傳送，並繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種方法。To send a string and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上傳之前的字串，這個方法轉換成陣列使用中指定的編碼屬性。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 這個方法會在傳輸字串時封鎖。This method blocks while the string is transmitted. 若要將字串傳送，並繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種方法。To send a string and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將字串傳送到資源。This method sends a string to a resource. 字串會使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式進行傳送。The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 上傳之前的字串，這個方法轉換成陣列使用中指定的編碼屬性。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 為字串上傳完成時收到通知，您可以加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the string upload completes, you can add an event handler to the event. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，字串會在傳送時。This method does not block the calling thread while the string is being sent. 若要等待伺服器回應時傳送字串，而區塊，使用其中一種方法。To send a string and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件會完成之後已上傳至資源的字串。The returned object will complete after the string has been uploaded to the resource. 字串會使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式進行傳送。The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 上傳之前的字串，這個方法轉換成陣列使用中指定的編碼屬性。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 這個方法會在傳輸字串時封鎖。This method blocks while the string is transmitted. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳送到伺服器。The method sends a to a server. 這個方法會封鎖將上傳資料時。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果伺服器不了解基礎的要求，基礎的通訊協定類別會判斷發生何種狀況。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 一般而言，會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果內容類型標頭`null`、方法將它設定為 「 應用程式/x-www-表單-urlencoded"。If the Content-type header is `null`, the method sets it to "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從使用者 （名稱、 年齡和位址） 收集資訊和公佈到伺服器時使用的值。The following code example gathers information from the user (name, age, and address) and posts the values to the server using . 任何來自伺服器的回應會顯示在主控台上。Any response from the server is displayed on the console. [!code-cpp[WebClient_UploadValues#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UploadValues/CPP/webclient_uploadvalues.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_UploadValues#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UploadValues/CS/webclient_uploadvalues.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_UploadValues#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UploadValues/VB/webclient_uploadvalues.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳送資源使用中指定的方法`method`參數，並從伺服器傳回任何回應。The method sends a to a resource using the method specified in the `method` parameter and returns any response from the server. 這個方法會封鎖將上傳資料時。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果`Content-type`標頭是`null`、方法將它設定為`application/x-www-form-urlencoded`。If the `Content-type` header is `null`, the method sets it to `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`. 如果`method`參數會指定不了解伺服器基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況的動詞命令。If the `method` parameter specifies a verb that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 一般而言，會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從使用者 （名稱、 年齡和位址） 收集資訊和公佈到伺服器時使用的值。The following code example gathers information from the user (name, age, and address) and posts the values to the server using . 任何來自伺服器的回應會顯示在主控台上。Any response from the server is displayed on the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將字串傳送到資源。This method sends a string to a resource. 字串會使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式進行傳送。The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 上傳之前的字串，這個方法轉換成陣列使用中指定的編碼屬性。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 為字串上傳完成時收到通知，您可以加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the string upload completes, you can add an event handler to the event. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，字串會在傳送時。This method does not block the calling thread while the string is being sent. 若要等待伺服器回應時傳送字串，而區塊，使用其中一種方法。To send a string and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件會完成之後已上傳至資源的名稱/值集合。The returned object will complete after the name/value collection has been uploaded to the resource. 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送的名稱/值集合。The name/value collection is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果伺服器不了解基礎的要求，基礎的通訊協定類別會判斷發生何種狀況。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 一般而言，會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果內容類型標頭`null`，這個方法將它設定為 「 應用程式/x-www-表單-urlencoded"。If the Content-type header is `null`, this method sets it to "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls whether the are sent with requests.

span.span: if the default credentials are used; otherwise .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`當要求所做的變更物件應該如果伺服器要求進行驗證使用目前登入使用者的預設認證。Set this property to `true` when requests made by this object should, if requested by the server, be authenticated using the default credentials of the currently logged on user. 用戶端應用程式，這是所要的行為，在大部分情況下。For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios. 對於中介層應用程式，例如 ASP.NET 應用程式，而不是使用這個屬性，您需要設定代表其提出要求的用戶端認證的屬性。For middle tier applications, such as ASP.NET applications, instead of using this property, you would typically set the property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates setting this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#3)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

summary.span: 在使用寫入資料流以將資料寫入資源的非同步作業已關閉時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous operation to write data to a resource using a write stream is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次非同步作業，用來將資料寫入至資源，使用 寫入資料流已關閉時，都會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous operation used to write data to a resource using a write stream is closed. 這些作業會導致從呼叫方法。These operations result from calls to the methods. 是針對此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別提供的事件資料的事件處理常式。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
